article.title: contact
article.para: The website is still quite new and we have several projects progressing at an alarming rate! If you would like to get involved please join the mailing list and keep an eye on the blog.

Things are moving quite fast with new tools coming available soon. In the meantime, should you wish to contact us, please leave a message or comment on our blog, Vimeo account or Flickr profile. Thank you for your patience!
